div.h2: Thank you for creating an account with ccMixter
div.p: You can keep track of your submissions and reviews by other Mixters by visiting your Artist Page:
You can also share this permanant, public address with friends.
div.h2: Changing Your Password and Other Preferences
div.p: It's highly recommended that you start things off by creating a new password and setting up other preferences on your own private Edit Your Profile page.
div.h2: Uploading Sampled Tracks, New Songs and Sample Libraries
div.p: Of course if you want to get straight to uploading you can jump right in by selecting the "Submit Files" options from the menu on the left.
